credit_line: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 120 x 90.2 cm (47 1/4 x 35 1/2 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: compound satin with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocading)
description: Dark gray medallions containing plant forms alternate with smaller rosettes, linked in vertical columns. The medallions and rosettes are brocaded with red and white silk and silver and gold threads. The puce ground has monochrome patterning in twill shot with flat strips of metal. The design is adapted from a Japanese source.
name: Textile
